column5: Beautiful Terry !!
I'm speechless.
wow, beautiful.  Thanks for posting this Terry.

Thanks for posting....  I look at that, and think of my 3 sons (4 1/2, 2, 12 weeks) and tears show up.  I'm calling home to tell them all how much I love them.  God bless you Gerritt and you family!  dk
Beautiful
Thank you Terry.  Gerritt.
wow. Well done.
Proof a picture says a thousand words. priceless.
Words cannot say enough.
Just beautiful Terry.  Nicely done.  Joey
very nice
Well done Terry!
Very Touching.
I'm speechless.
absolutely beautiful. Tears a plenty as I remember the posts.  Be strong  John
Terry...you're da man !!!  I got a yo-yo in my throat when I saw the picture...
beautiful Terry  As first time father of a 6-month old son, i can't even imagine...
That is a amazing !! well done
Beautiful portrait of a beautiful little boy.  Would it be okay to ask what his name is?

Absolutely..  Terrance Gerritt William...  That photo was taken the day before he was admitted to hospital.. He was not feeling well... but was still in good spirits... he passed less then 2 days later.. E. Coli.... You can see it in his eyes.. He was not feeling 100%  I have thousands of photos of Terry.. but this one really hits home with me...    Gerritt.
Beautiful Photo!! Well Done Terry....

Thank you.  Terrance Gerritt William is a strong name for your little man....just remember that his eyes in this picture that you have shared with us don't have that look anymore, he was in good spirits because he was being loved and he had no fear.   I hurt for you and your wife and I can't imagine the sadness that comes over you but I know the joy that you feel when you believe that you most definitely will be with him again....because you will.

WOW...simply incredible terry   !!!!!! thats an amazing picture of the little guy ,you are a great man terry,you to as well gerritt,for going through every parents worst nightmare,take care bud and enjoy all the great memories   shawn
